name: Alpha vs. Zet
description:
Alpha vs. Zet is action platformer.

Zet is the bad guy which wants to destroy the world of the letters.
Alpha is the good guy which will  going to stop Zet.

Game is still in the development, first 5 levels are ready in three difficulties.

How to play:
← → key: move
SPACE: jump & double jump (longer press higher jump).
